subject: Basketball
Interscholastic Athletics
Indians, American
lead_paragraph: The success of the girl’s basketball team at Sequoyah High, a small-town all-Indian school, and its star guard help a town and a tribe to aim higher.
snippet: The success of the girl’s basketball team at Sequoyah High, a small-town all-Indian school, and its star guard help a town and a tribe to aim higher.
